system.description:
Devoted to a higher power and filled with (righteous?) fury, you bring the wrath of your patron down with terrible ferocity. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You can maintain concentration on cleric spells while raging.

  • Half your cleric levels count as berserker levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.q1v63h8j4a87n3t0]{Extra Attack} feature.

  • Half your berserker levels count as cleric levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zezsezm2e0azb3ty]{Empowered Turning} features.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in berserker, 3 levels in cleric
